name: Modified Weapon Proficiency
text: You know how to use a specific weapon skillfully, even when it has undergone modification.
benefit: Select one type of weapon, such as longsword. You are always considered to be proficient with modified weapons of that type.
normal: A modified weapon is treated as one category more difficult to wield.
special: A warpriest with the focus weapon class feature can gain this feat with his deityâ€™s favored weapon in place of his bonus Weapon Focus feat. A magus with the kensai archetype can gain this feat with his chosen weapon in place of his bonus Weapon Focus feat.
